name: Lucie
description: The history is about Lucie, a girl who, after waking up in a strange room realises she is stuck in a lucid dream. She encounters evil beings and traps searching for her body while the plot suffers drastic twists.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8 Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06Ghz Memory: 168 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 131 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
